summary: This is a compleet new Design for Itemcards in Skyrim included into my RelativePrice mod.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=orange]Update Info[/color][/b]
RelPrice original Mod is up to date for 1.3.7.0 STEAM Version:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2262

(I will update the Design if it is working fine for all of you here)

_________________________________________________________________________________

Redesigned RelativePrice Modification.

[color=red]==> Install THIS as a replacement of RetalicePrice Modification to get the new design. The basics are the same, only changes the style of the Itemcards. See my RelativePrice Mod for a description of the main modification!!!![/color]

[color==orange][b]The RelativePrice mod can be found here:[/b][/color]

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2262
author: Lostvampire
